name: Plunder
author: Zero
description: Plunder - A modular Terraria companion mod with cheat features, item packs, and more

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable the Plunder mod

showPanelOnWorldLoad.label: Show Panel On World Load
showPanelOnWorldLoad.description: Automatically open the Plunder panel when entering a world

panelWidth.label: Panel Width
panelWidth.description: Width of the Plunder panel in pixels

panelHeight.label: Panel Height
panelHeight.description: Height of the Plunder panel in pixels

panelX.label: Panel X Position
panelX.description: X position of the panel (-1 for default center)

panelY.label: Panel Y Position
panelY.description: Y position of the panel (-1 for default center)

fullBrightEnabled.label: Full Bright
fullBrightEnabled.description: Remove all darkness - every tile fully lit

playerGlowEnabled.label: Player Glow
playerGlowEnabled.description: Player emits light like a torch - illuminates nearby area

fishingBuffsEnabled.label: Auto Fishing Buffs
fishingBuffsEnabled.description: Automatically apply fishing potion buffs when holding a fishing rod

autoFishingPotion.label: Auto Fishing Potion
autoFishingPotion.description: Inject Fishing Potion buff while fishing

autoSonarPotion.label: Auto Sonar Potion
autoSonarPotion.description: Inject Sonar Potion buff while fishing

autoCratePotion.label: Auto Crate Potion
autoCratePotion.description: Inject Crate Potion buff while fishing

fishingPowerMultiplier.label: Fishing Power Multiplier
fishingPowerMultiplier.description: Multiply fishing power (1x = normal, 10x = maximum boost)

legendaryCratesOnly.label: Legendary Crates Only
legendaryCratesOnly.description: Force every fishing catch to be a Golden/Titanium Crate

teleportToCursorEnabled.label: Teleport To Cursor
teleportToCursorEnabled.description: Enable teleporting to mouse cursor position with keybind

mapTeleportEnabled.label: Map Click Teleport
mapTeleportEnabled.description: Right-click on the fullscreen world map to teleport to that location

mapRevealEnabled.label: Full Map Reveal
mapRevealEnabled.description: Reveal the entire world map - removes fog of war

godMode.label: God Mode
godMode.description: Full invincibility - HP stays max, all damage blocked

infiniteMana.label: Infinite Mana
infiniteMana.description: Mana stays at maximum at all times

infiniteFlight.label: Infinite Flight
infiniteFlight.description: Wing and rocket time never run out

infiniteAmmo.label: Infinite Ammo
infiniteAmmo.description: Ammo is never consumed when shooting

infiniteBreath.label: Infinite Breath
infiniteBreath.description: Breath meter stays full - never drown

noKnockback.label: No Knockback
noKnockback.description: Player cannot be knocked back by enemies

damageMult.label: Damage Multiplier
damageMult.description: Damage multiplier (0 = one hit kill, 1 = normal, 2-20 = multiplier)

noTreeBombs.label: No Tree Bombs
noTreeBombs.description: Prevents trees from spawning lit bombs in For The Worthy / Zenith worlds

spawnRateMult.label: Spawn Rate Multiplier
spawnRateMult.description: Enemy spawn rate (0 = no spawns, 1 = normal, 2-20 = multiplier)

keybinds.label: Toggle Plunder Panel
keybinds.description: Open or close the main Plunder panel

keybinds.label: Toggle Fishing Buffs
keybinds.description: Toggle auto fishing buff injection on/off

keybinds.label: Toggle Teleport To Cursor
keybinds.description: Toggle the teleport to cursor feature on/off

keybinds.label: Teleport To Cursor
keybinds.description: Teleport to the mouse cursor position (must be enabled first)
